mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EF_PROJECT VALUES( #{project_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{project_title}, #{project_content}, #{project_status}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{project_target} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_START > SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_END >= SYSDATE AND SYSDATE >= PROJECT_START
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSDATE > PROJECT_END

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT A.*, B.LIKE_COUNT, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY B.LIKE_COUNT DESC, A.PROJECT_IDX ASC) AS "RANK_NO" FROM EF_PROJECT A, (SELECT A.PROJECT_IDX, COUNT(B.PROJECT_IDX) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM EF_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN EF_LIKE B ON A.PROJECT_IDX = B.PROJECT_IDX GROUP BY A.PROJECT_IDX) B WHERE A.PROJECT_IDX = B.PROJECT_IDX) A WHERE A.RANK_NO BETWEEN #{startList} AND #{endList}
